description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚华人经济学家，原籍湖南湘潭。因在文革期间撰写《中国向何处去》被判刑十年。后赴美留学，在经济学领域取得世界级成就，提出新兴古典经济学与超边际分析方法，曾两度被提名诺贝尔经济学奖。
description.en: An Australian-Chinese economist, originally from Xiangtan, Hunan. He was sentenced to ten years in prison for writing 'Where is China Going?' during the Cultural Revolution. He later studied in the United States and achieved world-class accomplishments in economics, proposing new classical economics and inframarginal analysis, and was nominated twice for the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场重大政治运动，对当时的社会、政治、经济和文化造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A major political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, which had a profound impact on the society, politics, economy, and culture of the time.

description.zh-cn: 由杨小凯在1968年撰写的文章，系统性地提出了“极左派”红卫兵的主张，批判了中国当时的官僚特权阶层，主张建立“中华人民公社”。该文导致杨小凯被判刑十年。
description.en: An article written by Yang Xiaokai in 1968 that systematically presented the views of the 'ultra-left' Red Guards, criticized China's bureaucratic privileged class at the time, and advocated for the establishment of a 'Chinese People's Commune'. The article led to Yang's ten-year prison sentence.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，在文化大革命期间担任中央文革小组顾问，曾将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. During the Cultural Revolution, he served as an advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group and labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中央文革小组组长，曾将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He served as the leader of the Central Cultural Revolution Group and labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，是“四人帮”成员之一，文化大革命期间具有重要影响力。她曾将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: Mao Zedong's fourth wife, a member of the 'Gang of Four,' and highly influential during the Cultural Revolution. She labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，在文革期间宣布“省无联”为反革命组织，杨小凯的《中国向何处去》一文也点名批判了他。
description.en: The first Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. During the Cultural Revolution, he declared the 'Shengwulian' a counter-revolutionary organization. Yang Xiaokai's article 'Where is China Going?' also criticized him by name.

zh-cn: 湖南省无产阶级革命派大联合委员会
en: Hunan Provincial Proletarian Revolutionaries Great Alliance Committee

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间湖南的一个红卫兵造反派组织，因发表《中国向何处去？》等文章，于1968年被中央宣布为反革命组织并予以取缔。
description.en: A Red Guard rebel faction organization in Hunan during the Cultural Revolution. It was declared a counter-revolutionary organization by the central government and banned in 1968 for publishing articles such as 'Where is China Going?'.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯的父亲，在文化大革命期间被关押。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai's father, who was imprisoned during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯的母亲，在文化大革命期间遭多次批斗后自杀身亡。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai's mother, who committed suicide after being subjected to multiple struggle sessions during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的著名私立研究型大学，杨小凯于1988年在此获得博士学位。
description.en: A renowned private research university in the United States, where Yang Xiaokai received his Ph.D. in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 位于澳大利亚的著名公立研究型大学，杨小凯自1988年起在此任教，后成为终身教授及经济系首席教授。
description.en: A prominent public research university in Australia where Yang Xiaokai taught from 1988, eventually becoming a tenured professor and Chair Professor of Economics.

description.zh-cn: 著名美籍华人经济学家，1983年在武汉大学访问时赏识杨小凯，并推荐其赴普林斯顿大学学习。
description.en: A renowned Chinese-American economist who, during a visit to Wuhan University in 1983, recognized Yang Xiaokai's talent and recommended him for study at Princeton University.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾任中国社会科学院副院长。他破格推荐杨小凯考入中国社会科学院经济研究所。
description.en: A Chinese economist and former vice president of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences. He made an exception to recommend Yang Xiaokai for admission to the Institute of Economics at CASS.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党史专家，曾任毛泽东秘书。他与女儿李南央一起向于光远保荐了杨小凯。
description.en: An expert on the history of the Communist Party of China and a former secretary to Mao Zedong. He, along with his daughter Li Nanyang, recommended Yang Xiaokai to Yu Guangyuan.

description.zh-cn: 李锐的女儿，她与父亲一起向于光远保荐了杨小凯。
description.en: The daughter of Li Rui, she and her father recommended Yang Xiaokai to Yu Guangyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省的最高审判机关。1983年，该法院撤销了对杨小凯的原判，宣布其无罪。
description.en: The highest judicial body in Hunan Province, China. In 1983, this court overturned the original verdict against Yang Xiaokai and declared him not guilty.

description.zh-cn: 由杨小凯提出的经济学理论，重新审视了古典经济学中关于分工与专业化的思想。
description.en: An economic theory proposed by Yang Xiaokai that re-examines the ideas of division of labor and specialization from classical economics.

description.zh-cn: 由杨小凯提倡的经济学分析方法，用于解释制度变迁以及经济跨越发展的内在动力。
description.en: An economic analysis method advocated by Yang Xiaokai, used to explain the internal dynamics of institutional change and leapfrog economic development.

description.zh-cn: 美国经济学家，1986年诺贝尔经济学奖得主。他高度评价杨小凯的研究工作。
description.en: An American economist and the 1986 Nobel laureate in Economic Sciences. He highly praised Yang Xiaokai's research.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯的妻子，也是一位经济学家。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai's wife, who is also an economist.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯于1962年至1968年就读的中学。
description.en: The high school where Yang Xiaokai studied from 1962 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国哲学社会科学研究的最高学术机构和综合研究中心。杨小凯于1982年在此获得硕士学位。
description.en: The highest academic institution and comprehensive research center for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China. Yang Xiaokai obtained his master's degree here in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名大学，杨小凯于1982年被该校聘为助教、讲师。
description.en: A famous university in China, where Yang Xiaokai was hired as a teaching assistant and lecturer in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省的县级市，是杨小凯的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jilin Province, China, and the birthplace of Yang Xiaokai.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚维多利亚州首府，杨小凯于2004年在此逝世。
description.en: The capital of Victoria, Australia, where Yang Xiaokai passed away in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命中的一个政治派别，杨小凯曾是其代表人物，并在《中国向何处去》中系统阐述其主张。
description.en: A political faction during the Cultural Revolution. Yang Xiaokai was a representative figure and systematically elaborated its views in 'Where is China Going?'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间响应毛泽东号召“造反”的群众组织派别。杨小凯因反对血统论而参加了造反派。
description.en: Mass organization factions that responded to Mao Zedong's call to 'rebel' during the Cultural Revolution. Yang Xiaokai joined the Rebel Faction because he opposed the 'bloodline theory'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期的一种思想，强调家庭出身决定个人政治地位，核心口号是“老子英雄儿好汉，老子反动儿混蛋”。杨小凯因反对该理论而参加造反派。
description.en: An ideology in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution that emphasized family background determining one's political status, with the core slogan 'If the father is a hero, the son is a good man; if the father is a reactionary, the son is a bastard'. Yang Xiaokai joined the rebel faction in opposition to this theory.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在中国各地建立的临时权力机构。杨小凯在《中国向何处去》中批判其为旧官僚专政。
description.en: Provisional organs of power established throughout China during the Cultural Revolution. Yang Xiaokai criticized them in 'Where is China Going?' as dictatorships of the old bureaucracy.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯于1948年10月6日出生于吉林省敦化县。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai was born in Dunhua County, Jilin Province on October 6, 1948.

description.zh-cn: 1962年至1968年在长沙市第一中学就读。
description.en: Studied at Changsha No. 1 High School from 1962 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯是文革期间“极左派”红卫兵的代表人物。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai was a representative figure of the 'ultra-left' Red Guards during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯因反对血统论而参加了造反派。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai joined the Rebel Faction because he opposed the 'bloodline theory'.

description.zh-cn: 于1968年1月撰写并发表了《中国向何处去》。
description.en: Authored and published 'Where is China Going?' in January 1968.

description.zh-cn: 《中国向何处去》一文批判了当时陆续建立的革命委员会，认为其大多是旧官僚专政。
description.en: The article 'Where is China Going?' criticized the revolutionary committees being established at the time, viewing them mostly as dictatorships of the old bureaucracy.

description.zh-cn: 因撰写《中国向何处去》，杨小凯被定为“现行反革命罪”，并被判刑十年。
description.en: For writing 'Where is China Going?', Yang Xiaokai was convicted of 'active counter-revolutionary crimes' and sentenced to ten years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: Labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: Labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 将杨小凯及其文章《中国向何处去》点名为“反革命”。
description.en: Labeled Yang Xiaokai and his article 'Where is China Going?' as 'counter-revolutionary'.

description.zh-cn: 于1968年1月24日称“省无联”为反革命组织。
description.en: On January 24, 1968, he declared the 'Shengwulian' a counter-revolutionary organization.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯在文革期间因言获罪，服刑十年。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Yang Xiaokai was imprisoned for ten years for his writings.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯的父亲杨第甫在文革期间被关在“毛泽东思想学习班”。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai's father, Yang Difu, was imprisoned in a 'Mao Zedong Thought study class' during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯的母亲陈素在文革期间被多次批斗后悬梁自缢。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai's mother, Chen Su, was subjected to multiple struggle sessions during the Cultural Revolution and subsequently committed suicide by hanging.

description.zh-cn: 向于光远保荐杨小凯，促成其进入中国社会科学院。
description.en: Recommended Yang Xiaokai to Yu Guangyuan, which facilitated his admission to the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 与其父李锐一同向于光远保荐杨小凯。
description.en: Together with her father Li Rui, she recommended Yang Xiaokai to Yu Guangyuan.

description.zh-cn: 李南央是李锐的女儿。
description.en: Li Nanyang is the daughter of Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: 破格推荐杨小凯考入中国社会科学院经济研究所。
description.en: Made an exception to recommend Yang Xiaokai for admission to the Institute of Economics at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 1982年毕业于中国社会科学院经济研究所，获硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from the Institute of Economics at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences in 1982 with a Master's degree.

description.zh-cn: 于1983年撤销对杨小凯的原判，宣布其无罪，为他平反。
description.en: In 1983, the court overturned the original verdict against Yang Xiaokai, declaring him not guilty and exonerating him.

description.zh-cn: 赏识并推荐杨小凯赴美国普林斯顿大学学习。
description.en: Recognized Yang Xiaokai's talent and recommended him to study at Princeton University in the United States.

position.zh-cn: 讲师、高级讲师、正教授、首席教授
position.en: Lecturer, Senior Lecturer, Professor, Chair Professor

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯提出了新兴古典经济学理论。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai proposed the theory of new classical economics.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯提倡使用超边际分析方法。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai advocated for the use of the inframarginal analysis method.

description.zh-cn: 高度评价杨小凯的研究，认为当时全世界最重要的经济研究在蒙纳士大学，由杨小凯所做。
description.en: Highly praised Yang Xiaokai's research, stating that the most important economic research in the world at the time was being done by Yang Xiaokai at Monash University.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯是杨第甫的儿子。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai is the son of Yang Difu.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯是陈素的儿子。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai is the son of Chen Su.

description.zh-cn: 吴小娟是杨小凯的妻子。
description.en: Wu Xiaojuan is Yang Xiaokai's wife.

description.zh-cn: 杨小凯反对血统论，并因此参加了造反派。
description.en: Yang Xiaokai opposed the 'bloodline theory' and joined the rebel faction as a result.
